column4: everytime i gksudo nautilus, my background changes to the "root" background and things get all wierd, like im completely logged in with root. ??
that's because it's using Roots theme preferences
is there a way to get rid of that
if you do "sudo ln -s ~/.themes /root/.themes" and "sudo ln -s ~/.icons /root/.icons" and "sudo ln -s ~/.fonts /root/.fonts" that should work
